title: Gold toilet: Two men jailed for £4.8m Blenheim Palace heist
newsTitle: Two men jailed for £4.8m gold toilet heist
content: Two men jailed for £4.8m gold toilet heist26 minutes agoShareSaveClodagh StensonBBC South InvestigationsShareSaveBlenheim PalaceThe solid gold toilet weighed 98kg (216lbs) and was insured for $6m (£4.8m)Two men have been jailed for stealing a £4.8m gold toilet from from an art exhibition at Blenheim Palace.Thieves smashed their way in and ripped out the functional 18-carat, solid gold toilet hours after a glamorous launch party at the Oxfordshire stately home in September 2019.James 'Jimmy' Shee...

title: Who were the Iranian commanders killed in Israel's attack?
newsTitle: Who were the Iranian commanders killed in Israel's attack?
content: Who were the Iranian commanders killed in Israel's attack?16 minutes agoShareSaveKasra Naji, BBC Persian & Alys Davies, BBC NewsShareSaveAFP/GettyIsrael struck dozens of targets, including nuclear facilities, military sites and private residences, across Iran on Friday, killing a number of senior military commanders in what it called "Operation Rising Lion".The Israeli attacks also targeted a number of other influential figures linked to Iran's nuclear programmes, including six nuclear scientist...
